name: Taj Resorts and Palaces
description: A curation of authentic living palaces, landmark hotels, resorts and safaris, Taj is the hallmark of iconic hospitality across the globe. The brand is recognised for its warm and intuitive service and is the undisputed leader in Indian hospitality.
